name: AI Product Content Creator for WooCommerce
author: StorePro

sections.description:
This plugin uses AI to generate product content for WooCommerce products. It creates compelling, SEO-optimized titles, descriptions, and short descriptions based on user input.

Disclaimer

AI Product Content Creator for WooCommerce is a plugin relies on the OpenAI API to generate content for WooCommerce products. When you use this plugin, requests are sent to the OpenAI API for processing. You need your own API keys and must follow the rules set by the AI service you choose. For OpenAI, check their Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. It is also important to check your usage on the OpenAI website for accurate information. Please do so with other services as well.

The developer of AI Product Content Creator for WooCommerce and related parties are not responsible for any issues or losses caused by using the plugin or AI-generated content. You should talk to a legal expert and follow the laws and regulations of your country. AI Product Content Creator for WooCommerce does only store data on your own server, and it is your responsibility to keep it safe.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the ai-product-content-creator-for-woocommerce folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Configure settings under ‘AI Content Creator’ in the admin dashboard.
sections.faq:
How do I use the plugin?

You can generate product content by navigating to the product edit page.

Where can I get support?

Support is available through the plugin support page.

Why is an OpenAI API key needed?

The OpenAI API key is required for the plugin to connect with OpenAI’s AI services. It acts as an authentication method, allowing the plugin to communicate with OpenAI’s API and perform content generation tasks.

The result is not HTML?

AI-generated content might occasionally vary from expectations. If the output isn’t as desired, try generating it again. Be concise with your instructions, as too many details can lead to confusion. Think of it like giving simple, clear directions to someone unfamiliar with the task.

short_description: AI-powered content generation for WooCommerce products, including titles, descriptions, and short descriptions.
